extraction.outcome: mean ± SD length of hospital stay between periods 1 and 2 in patients who did not suffer from VAP
extraction.notes: Values are mean ± SD length of hospital stay (days) during period 1 for patients without VAP, reported separately by ICU. Period-2 values (unit A: 9.9 ± 14.8; unit B: 9.1 ± 9.9) are also given in text but no group sizes are reported.
